chapter.title: CVE-2021-36828
chapter.text: WP Maintenance plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victims Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victims cookie-based authentication credentials.

WordPress WP Maintenance plugin for WordPress 6.0.4

report.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2021-36828 WP Maintenance plugin for WordPress Vulnerability

chapter.title: Remediation
chapter.text:
Upgrade to the latest version of WP Maintenance plugin for WordPress, available from the WordPress Plugin Directory.
WordPress Plugin Directory
